segments.text: Ok , so where do you think we can save more money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we could eat in more . That 300 dollars for entertainment is mostly going to restaurants .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . That ’ s a good idea and you like to cook . What about the books ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on . If we save more money , we can retire earlier and you ’ ll actually have time to read all those books you buy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , what about the 50 you spent on a shirt ? You could have gotten something for less .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . Let's compromise . If you agree to only spend 75 on books , I'll agree to only spend 40 for my next shirt .
segments.speaker: S1
